Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 99th overall pick, by Texas in 1970...
Traded from Texas to Philadelphia on 4/1/1970 (Going to TEX: P D. Zanni. Going to PHI: 2B F. Andrews)...
Released by Philadelphia on 4/28/1970...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/28/1970 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/13/1971 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/11/1975 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/30/1975 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1977, off Ken Brett (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1977, off Ron Klimkowski (NYY)...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/17/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $2,820,000 per year...
Injured on 5/8/1983 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/11/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $935,000 per year...
